name: Tricky Treaters (JamJarLOL)
description:
The newest release from Libra Games, welcome to Tricky Treaters!

It's Halloween night, and those darn kids are out and about! Collect your treat bucket and hand out sweets before the night is over, even if you would rather stay in and watch the TV. 

Disclaimer: This is the first game Libra Games has ever made, so there's probably a backlog of bugs and glitches, as reported by test players, who have refused to touch the game since their initial playthroughs. Unfortunately, we are a small team, with very little game-making experience, so progress on fixing such issues may be slow.
